data.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2: The Hunger Games: A Photographic Journey
data.detailed_description: As the official on-set photographer for all four Hunger Games films, Murray Close was afforded a privileged view in which to document everything. In this revealing discussion with Murray, we will discover his unique perspective as witness to the extraordinary events captured by his lens.
